column4: I installed ubuntu on my laptop. Package manager tells me i have updates, but when I type in my root password it opens nothing. Going to synaptic package manger wont open anything either. I switched to root in terminal and still it sounds as if it (package manager) will open, but it doesnt
My package manager will not open with my root password. It sounds as if it will but never opens, is this an install error on my part?
have you tried your own password?
